DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: Name for this property. This label is the significant name string that defines the semantic meaning for the property.

DocAttribute.Name: Specification
DocAttribute.Documentation: Informative text to explain the property.

DocAttribute.Name: PartOfPset
PropertyForDependance
DocAttribute.Documentation: The property on whose value that of another property depends.

DocAttribute.Name: PropertyDependsOn
DocAttribute.Documentation: The relating property on which the value of the property depends.

DocAttribute.Name: PartOfComplex
